# Azure Functions TypeScript - Event Hubs Project

This is a TypeScript Azure Functions project with Event Hubs trigger and output binding.

## Project Structure
- `src/functions/` - Azure Functions code
- `infra/` - Bicep infrastructure files
- TypeScript configuration for type safety

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all function code
- Follow Azure Functions v4 programming model with Node.js 22
- Use Bicep for infrastructure as code
- Maintain type safety throughout the codebase
